name: Terracotta - Shards of Doom
description:
High Wizard Clayton has animated clay pots to attack people! Do you have what it takes to stop him? Travel across different worlds fighting High Wizard Clayton's pot army, discovering hidden pots and finding new weapons! Terracotta is a First Person Collectathon focused on shattering pots and watching them explode.

Terracotta features 6 different weapons offering different ways of playing, 6 unique enemies to shatter, hidden pots among each level, 4 unique worlds and bosses, and partial Xbox controller support.

Terracotta is a single player experience for players to enjoy and relieve some stress. Have fun!
